works.complaint:
The articles and statements are a clear defamation of 

character. I have been represented by attorney John Wales. I was advised  

by a libel & slander attorney to communicate with Google to get these  
negative articles and impressions of me removed. The defamation here is  
against myself who is in a public trust position as a government employee.
 
The contents are clearly untrue and has caused clear defamation of  
character and slander which has damaged my professional reputation and  
credibility. I am politely requesting that you  remove the defamatory and 

negative press associated with my name from all of your Google search  
engines. Thank you kindly in advance!

Anthony Bradford
